author: jfclere
msg: Change the order of mod_proxy and mod_proxy_balancer child_init().
Change the balancer workers area to the address of workers instead copying the workers.
Move the creation of conf->forward worker to mod_proxy child_init().

msg: Aligning  portlet.xml and web.xml for portlet api 2.0 in portlet application archetype

msg: Fix a few problems with command bundles not starting correctly

author: cziegeler
msg: Use next dev version of parent pom

author: fapeeler
msg: updated node_status routine so it can be called by tools outside of
- extended to accept non-class method calls
- changed basic flow to always get the state of a vm
- vmstate is now on,off,stuck instead of 0,1
